title: Remodeled Two Bed One Bath
posting_body: 2BR/1BA first floor apartment in the Mission Dolores district.
Floors are hardwood except ceramic tile in the kitchen.
Living room has an open kitchen with gas stove, dishwasher, refrigerator and lots of cabinets and storage space.
The bedrooms are good size with big closets.
The bedrooms have nice windows to bring plenty of sun light.
Each bedroom has a closet with sliding mirror doors.
Split bathroom with tub.
Spacious backyard is concrete with additional space for those who enjoy gardening and potted plants, ideal for BBQ.
Entire apartment gets lots of natural light
Closed to restaurants and coffee shop.
Walking distance from Potrero Hill shopping center.
Plenty of public transportation.
Tenants pays for PG&E and cable/internet
One year lease agreement then month to month.
Must see to appreciate!
Easy to show.
Please call Agent
Lucila Sanchez
show contact info

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
